## Fire detection script

**Fire detection** is a script for the **Sentinel-hub EO-Browser** (https://apps.sentinel-hub.com/eo-browser) that highlights the burning areas.

### Example

https://apps.sentinel-hub.com/eo-browser/?lat=63.7392&lng=107.9372&zoom=11&time=2019-07-24&preset=CUSTOM&datasource=Sentinel-2%20L1C&layers=B01,B02,B03&%2BIDEpCiAgICByZXR1cm4gZmlyZV9jb2xvcl9oaWdoX2NvbnRyYXN0OwogIGlmIChmaW5kX3dhdGVyX2JvZGllcyAmJiBuZHdpID4gbmR3aV9oaSkKICAgIHJldHVybiB3YXRlcl9jb2xvcjsKICByZXR1cm4gWzAsIDAsIDBdOwp9CgppZiAoZmlyZV9pbmRleCA%%3D%3D
